tool_description: Analyzes historical performance metrics for assets including returns, volatility, Sharpe ratios, and drawdowns to inform allocation decisions.

asset_symbols.description: List of asset ticker symbols to analyze

error_messages: Invalid symbols: One or more ticker symbols are not recognized or have insufficient data.
Invalid period: Analysis period must be between 3 and 120 months.
Invalid benchmark: Benchmark symbol is not recognized or has insufficient data.
Insufficient data: Not enough historical data available for the requested analysis period.
usage: Provide a list of asset symbols and analysis period in months. Optionally specify a benchmark symbol for relative performance comparison.

max_drawdowns.description: Maximum drawdown percentages for each asset

beta_values.description: Beta values relative to benchmark for each asset

performance_summary.description: Summary analysis of asset performance characteristics
